class createcloth.verbesserer.strickalterator(nodeattributes_input, edges_input, nodeattributes_output, edges_output, node_edits, edge_edits, spanningtree_nodes, spanningtree_generate_from, **kwargs)¶
find_inputtranslation(nodeattributes, edges_with_attributes, sourcenode, nodehashes_target=None, edges_target=None, dict_edge_target=None, throw_exception_when_multiple=False)¶
Parameters

  • sourcenode – Startnode for graphfinding of given graph

  • nodehashes_target – Optional for optimization

  • edges_target – Optional for optimization

  • dict_edge_target – Optional for optimization

  • throw_exception_when_multiple (bool) – trigger to throw exception, when multiple inputtranslations are possible

Raises

NoTranslationPossible

Returns

Translation from saved graph to given graph

Return type

dict[ str, str ]

Todo

remove marked

classmethod from_manuals(manual_old, manual_new, stitchinfo, start_at='bottomleft', manual_type='machine', startside='right', startpoint_method='marked', reverse=False)¶

generates everything i need for replacing a subgraph

Parameters

  • startpoint_method – keyword for finding the startpoint for replacement

  • nodes_to_consider (none, networkx.graph or list) – state which nodes should be searched for, when replacing a subgraph. if none equals automated

  • manual_old – the graph where the subgraph is to be searched for

  • manual_new – the target graph

  • start_at (str) – string to determine which node should be starting node for the search later in the replacement possible options are given by: find_startpoint_dictionary.keys() extra options can be added, see find_startpoint_dictionary
